department: Public Works and Government Services Canada - Office of the Auditor General
description: The Office of the Auditor General of Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Ontario, Qu\u00e9bec, Manitoba, & Alberta, by September 30, 2022.
full_summary:
**Invitation à soumissionner (RFP 375) - Arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour les fauteuils de bureau**

**RFP Reference Information**
---------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: RFP 375
*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01003538
*   **Publication Date**: 09 August 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 26 August 2022, 14h00 (Eastern Daylight Time (EDT))
*   **Amendment Date et numéro de modification**: 22 August 2022, Modification N° 2

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (SA)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

**Description du produit et du besoin**
--------------------------------

*   **Description du produit**: School chairs
*   **Supplier’s furnished description of goods or services**: The Office of the Auditor General of Canada requires the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Ontario, Québec, Manitoba, & Alberta, by 30 September 2022, which will be delivered and installed at the employee’s home.

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

Any official tender documents related to this RFP can be downloaded at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders) under the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/8bf7e69768125dd79e514edeeadc7775/rfp_375_-_office_seating_-_rfp_document_en_amendment_001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/8bf7e69768125dd79e514edeeadc7775/rfp_375_-_office_seating_-_rfp_document_en_amendment_001.pdf)
